name: Fruit Punchr
description:
Are you thirsty for some fruit punch? Well then, why not lay the smackdown on some (mysteriously sentient?) fruit and juice it up before they go bad!

Features:

  • 3 kinds of fruit to beat up!
  • 3 difficulty modes!
  • Some juicy effects!

Controls:

  • Punches - WASD, Arrow Keys, ZXCV
  • Options - Esc

Made for the Juice Jam 2022! Post your high scores!

Warning! This game contains flashing colors, these are toggleable.
